trans-unit.source: Defines an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ICommand" /> that is routed through the element tree and contains a text property.
trans-unit.target: Define um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ICommand" /> que é roteado através da árvore de elemento e contém uma propriedade de texto.

trans-unit.source: The difference between a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is that <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand> includes a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A diferença entre um <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> é que <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand> inclui um <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand.Text%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> methods on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> do not contain the command logic for the command, as is the case with a typical <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> métodos em um <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> não contém a lógica de comando para o comando, como é o caso típico <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>.

trans-unit.source: These methods raise events that traverse the element tree looking for an object with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>.
trans-unit.target: Esses métodos geram eventos que atravessam a árvore de elementos procurando por um objeto com um <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>.

trans-unit.source: The event handlers attached to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> contain the command logic.
trans-unit.target: Os manipuladores de eventos anexados para o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> contêm a lógica de comando.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> events.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> events.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> eventos.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso do Atributo XAML

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valores XAML

trans-unit.source: *predefinedClassName*
trans-unit.target: *predefinedClassName*

trans-unit.source: One of the predefined command classes.
trans-unit.target: Uma das classes de comando predefinidos.

trans-unit.source: *predefinedCommandName*
trans-unit.target: *predefinedCommandName*

trans-unit.source: One of the predefined commands.
trans-unit.target: Um dos comandos predefinidos.

trans-unit.source: *prefix*
trans-unit.target: *prefix*

trans-unit.source: The `xlmns` prefix that maps *customClassName*.*customCommandName* to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_net](~/includes/tla2sharptla-net-md.md)] class.
trans-unit.target: O `xlmns` prefixo que mapeia *customClassName*.* customCommandName* para o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_net](~/includes/tla2sharptla-net-md.md)] classe.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Namespaces XAML e o mapeamento de Namespace para WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).

trans-unit.source: *customClassName*
trans-unit.target: *customClassName*

trans-unit.source: A custom class that contains the custom command.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe personalizada que contém o comando personalizado.

trans-unit.source: *customCommandName*
trans-unit.target: *customCommandName*

trans-unit.source: A custom command.
trans-unit.target: Um comando personalizado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand" />.

trans-unit.source: Descriptive text for the command.
trans-unit.target: Texto descritivo para o comando.

trans-unit.source: The declared name of the command for serialization.
trans-unit.target: O nome declarado do comando para serialização.

trans-unit.source: The type that is registering the command.
trans-unit.target: O tipo que está registrando o comando.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand" /> class, using the specified descriptive text, declared name, and owner type.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand" /> usando o texto descritivo, o nome declarado e o tipo de proprietário especificados.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ownerType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ownerType" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Descriptive text for the command.
trans-unit.target: Texto descritivo para o comando.

trans-unit.source: The declared name of the command for serialization.
trans-unit.target: O nome declarado do comando para serialização.

trans-unit.source: The type that is registering the command.
trans-unit.target: O tipo que está registrando o comando.

trans-unit.source: A collection of gestures to associate with the command.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de gestos a serem associados ao comando.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand" /> class, using the specified descriptive text, declared name, owner type, and input gestures.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand" /> usando o texto descritivo, o nome declarado, o tipo de proprietário e os gestos de entrada especificados.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ownerType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ownerType" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that describes this command.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto que descreve este comando.

trans-unit.source: The text that describes the command.
trans-unit.target: O texto que descreve o comando.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.
